species.name: farfetchd
descriptions: Farfetch’d is always seen with a stalk from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good stalks and bad stalks. This Pokémon has been known to fight with others over stalks.
If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant stalks grow, it uses its own stalk to thwart them.
If it eats the plant stalk it carries as emergency rations, it runs off in search of a new stalk.
In order to prevent their extinction, more people have made an effort to breed these Pokémon.
It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest.

abilities.name: defiant
abilities.effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.
